summary: REQ-8 appears to be implemented (at least partially) by adding required PNG metadata and a PNG dimension reader to `frontend/vite-build-verify.js`, but REQ-7 is not implemented because no PNG files were added under `frontend/public/generated/`. The diff also includes substantial unrelated frontend/UI/product changes that were not requested and go beyond the stated non-goals.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the specified PNG files (exact filenames, case-sensitive) under `frontend/public/generated/` so they are served from `/generated/...` and included in `frontend/dist/generated/` after `vite build`.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files, and there is no evidence that any of the required PNGs were added to `frontend/public/generated/`.
evidence: File diff summary: "Added: 0" and "ADDED FILES: - none"
